title: Interactive Portfolio Website
description: Full-stack portfolio website with dynamic content, interactive galleries, and integrated contact system
longDescription:
Developed a comprehensive portfolio website featuring modern web technologies and full-stack architecture. Built with vanilla JavaScript for optimal performance and deployed on Vercel with serverless backend integration.

Key Features:

  • Interactive modal gallery system with keyboard navigation and touch support
  • Serverless contact form with email notifications via Resend API
  • Real-time data storage using Supabase PostgreSQL database
  • Responsive design with Syracuse University branding and color scheme
  • Dynamic skills showcase with detailed experience descriptions

Technical Implementation:

  • Vanilla HTML/CSS/JavaScript for frontend performance optimization
  • Python Flask serverless functions for backend API endpoints
  • Environment variable management for secure API key handling
  • Git version control with continuous deployment pipeline

images.alt: Portfolio homepage with Syracuse University branding
images.caption: Homepage featuring responsive design and campus background
